item.title: Dentist Inputs on Diabetes and Oral Health
item.description: In diabetes people, due to increased glycaemic state, there will be more glucose and nutrients available for bacteria to keep alive and flourish. And this results in an increase in the bacterial load, as they can live and flourish well. And diabetic people take insulin, which is a hormone that is necessary to keep the level of blood glucose under check. And Diabetes mellitus (DM), is a group of me
